Descriptions.Value:
1 King Bed

Overlooking the city


Internet - Free WiFi

Entertainment - 55-inch flat-screen TV with cable channels and pay movies

Food & Drink - Refrigerator, coffee/tea maker, and 24-hour room service

Sleep - Pillowtop bed, premium bedding, blackout drapes/curtains, and turndown service

Bathroom - Private bathroom, bathrobes, and a bathtub or shower with a rainfall showerhead

Practical - Safe, free weekday newspaper, and iron/ironing board; rollaway/extra beds and free cribs/infant beds available on request

Comfort - Daily housekeeping and climate-controlled heating and air conditioning

Non-Smoking
